segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely oblivious to the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense on that plate; it’s as if nothing else exists in her world right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the puddle is growing, creeping closer to her feet, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of worry for her; what if she slips on that water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Looking over, I see the boy on the stool, stretching upward with all his might.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but that stool looks like it could give at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her eager hand raised, seems to be completely unaware of the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR
